pages.title: Kamen Rider Amazon New Omega
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Amazons Season 2 (2017, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:amazons/devices/neo_amazons_driver_omega)Neo Amazons Driver (New Omega)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VIII$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Regeneration III$(li)Jump Boost$(li)Strength XI (with empty hand)
